short_summary: Temporary Help Services for Department of National Defense
duration_in_months: You have the usual timeframes of 30, 60, or 90 days.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Notice ID: cb-657-29571517
### Solicitation ID: S4932611

## Title and Description
Temporary Help Services for One (1) Special Advisor
The Department of National Defense (DND) requires temporary help services for the position of one (1) Special Advisor. This requirement is open exclusively to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who are qualified under the following streams and categories: 13.9 Special Advisor.

### Brief Description
• The Department of National Defense has a requirement for temporary help services.
• The services will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR) for the Department of National Defense.
• The requirement is open to Supply Arrangement holders under EN578-172870.

## Evaluation Criteria and Requirements

• The evaluation will be based on the lowest price offered.
• Suppliers must meet mandatory requirements.

## Notice Information
### Solicitation Number
S4932611
### Publication Date
2024-06-24
### Closing Date for Tender
2024-07-02 15:30:00
### End Date
None

## Suppliers Invited to Bid
Only the following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* DLS Technology Corporation
* eVision Inc., SoftSim Technologies Inc. in Joint Venture
* Gomes Consulting Enterprises Ltd.
* Kyndryl Canada Limited; ISM Information Systems Management Corporation IN JOINT VENTURE
* Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
* Pleiad Canada Inc.
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
* SRC CAN Ltd
* TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
* Taligent Consulting Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* V42 Management Consulting, Inc.
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.
